JUniters:

These posts discuss adding a count of assertions to
each run:

http://groups.yahoo.com/group/junit/message/1329

This feature is very useful for a burn-up chart in a
legacy code situation.

Is this feature in the latest published version and I
could not find it?

If not, could someone fling me a code snip to get me started?

Phlip
  http://industrialxp.org/community/bin/view/Main/TestFirstUserInterfaces
